19 bool CalibrateCell::init()
20 {
21  std::cout << "Initing" << std::endl;
22  nrOfMsgs = 100;
23  msgs=0;
24  tf::Quaternion q(0, 0, 0, 0);
25  tf::Vector3 v(0,0,0);
26  positions.push_back(v);
27  quaternions.push_back(q);
28  cameraName = "";
29 
30  ros::init(init_argc,init_argv,"calib_cell");
31  if ( ! ros::master::check() ) {
32  return false;
33  }
34  ros::start();
35 
36  ros::NodeHandle n;
37  subPose = n.subscribe<ar_track_alvar_msgs::AlvarMarkers, CalibrateCell>("/ar_pose_marker", 10, &CalibrateCell::camPosCallback1, this);
38 
39  return true;
40 }

42 void CalibrateCell::run()
43 {
44  std::cout << "Running" << std::endl;
45  ros::Rate loop_rate(200);
46  while ( ros::ok() ){
47  ros::spinOnce();
48  loop_rate.sleep();
49  }
50 }

52 void CalibrateCell::camPosCallback1(const ar_track_alvar_msgs::AlvarMarkersConstPtr &cam_pos)
53 {
54  if(cam_pos->markers.size() == 0){
55  return;
56  }
57  // Camera ID
58  std::string cameraID = cam_pos->markers.at(0).header.frame_id;
59  // Position XYZ
60  geometry_msgs::Point positionMsg = cam_pos->markers.at(0).pose.pose.position;
61  tf::Vector3 position(positionMsg.x, positionMsg.y, positionMsg.z);
62  // Rotation
63  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quatMsg = cam_pos->markers.at(0).pose.pose.orientation;
64  tf::Quaternion q(quatMsg.x, quatMsg.y, quatMsg.z, quatMsg.w);
65 
66 
67  if(msgs == nrOfMsgs){
68  std::cout << "Im done" << std::endl;
69  subPose.shutdown();
70  averageRotations();
71  ros::shutdown();
72 
73  }
74  addNewTransformation(cameraID,position,q);
75 
76 }

78 Eigen::Matrix4f CalibrateCell::calcTransformationMatrix(std::string cameraID, tf::Vector3 position, tf::Quaternion quaternion)
79 {
80  tf::Matrix3x3 rotation(quaternion);
81  Eigen::Matrix4f transTmp;
82  transTmp << rotation.getColumn(0).getX(), rotation.getColumn(1).getX(), rotation.getColumn(2).getX(), position.getX(),
83  rotation.getColumn(0).getY(), rotation.getColumn(1).getY(), rotation.getColumn(2).getY(), position.getY(),
84  rotation.getColumn(0).getZ(), rotation.getColumn(1).getZ(), rotation.getColumn(2).getZ(), position.getZ(),
85  0, 0, 0, 1;
86 
87  //std::cout << cameraID << std::endl;
88  //std::cout << transTmp << std::endl;
89  double roll, pitch, yaw;
90  std::cout << "Rotation RPY: " << std::endl;
91  rotation.getRPY(roll, pitch, yaw);
92  std::cout << roll << std::endl;
93  std::cout << pitch << std::endl;
94  std::cout << yaw << std::endl;
95 
96  return transTmp;
97 }

99 void CalibrateCell::addNewTransformation(std::string cameraID, tf::Vector3 position, tf::Quaternion quaternion)

104  std::cout << "Number: ";

117 void CalibrateCell::averageRotations()
118 {
119  std::vector<float> x(quaternions.size());
120  std::vector<float> y(quaternions.size());
121  std::vector<float> z(quaternions.size());
122  std::vector<float> w(quaternions.size());
123 
124  std::vector<float> xPos(quaternions.size());
125  std::vector<float> yPos(quaternions.size());
126  std::vector<float> zPos(quaternions.size());
127 
128  float div = 1.0f/(float)nrOfMsgs;
129  //std::cout << div << std::endl;
130 
131  for(int i=0; i<quaternions.size(); i++){
132  x[i] = quaternions.at(i).getX()*div;
133  y[i] = quaternions.at(i).getY()*div;
134  z[i] = quaternions.at(i).getZ()*div;
135  w[i] = quaternions.at(i).getW()*div;
136 
137  xPos[i] = positions.at(i).getX()*div;
138  yPos[i] = positions.at(i).getY()*div;
139  zPos[i] = positions.at(i).getZ()*div;
140  }
141 
142  for(int k=0; k<quaternions.size(); k++){
143  tf::Quaternion quat(x.at(k), y.at(k), z.at(k), w.at(k));
144  quat.normalize();
145  tf::Vector3 position(xPos.at(k), yPos.at(k), zPos.at(k));
146  Eigen::Matrix4f tmp = calcTransformationMatrix(cameraName,position, quat);
147  transformationMatrices.push_back(tmp);
148  }
149 
150  char chars[] = "/";
151 
152  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < strlen(chars); ++i)
153  {
154  cameraName.erase (std::remove(cameraName.begin(), cameraName.end(), chars[i]), cameraName.end());
155  }
156 
157  std::string tmp = "/home/minions/";
158  tmp.append(cameraName);
159  tmp.append(".txt");
160 
161  std::ofstream file(tmp.c_str());
162  if (file.is_open())
163  {
164  for(int i=0; i<transformationMatrices.size(); i++){
165  file << "Matrix for: " << cameraName << '\n';
166  file << transformationMatrices.at(i) << '\n' << '\n';
167  }
168 
169  }
170 
171  std::cout << "Done calibrating, wrote matrix to file: ";
172  std::cout << tmp << std::endl;
173 
174 }

181  cell.run();
